transcript:
Hi, my name is Jacob Staton and this is my
financial management capstone project.
So, I've built a tool for data analyst
called Equity Compass and this is an
interactive tool that gives you a full
equity report for in this case the
Nvidia Corporation.
So this can be used by data analysts and
traders alike to help determine if they
want to invest in a company. So down
here you can see it includes a analyst
rating and it's based on a scale of 1 to
five.
And this basically gives both analysts
and in this case more so traders a
breakdown as to like the consensus as to
buying the stock. So in this case it
gives it a 4.8 out of five uh 92% for
buy 6% for hold and only 2% for selling
given the stock at the moment. And
there is an interactive portion here.
You can break it down between week,
a month,
a year,
and a 5-year breakdown of the stock.
And it is just overall it includes some
information such as the current stock
price for today has the market cap, the
dividend yield, the
um the 52- week high, the 52- week low.
That's a sector breakdown.
Um it also has financial performance
here in the bottom.
So this basically breaks it down between
revenue and net income for each year.
And you can see there was a big jump
here between 2022 and 2023.
And here at the bottom it gives some
just some a brief overview of the
company. It gives like a some
background. The Nvidia Corporation,
tells you the name of the CEO, where
their headquarters are located, when
they were founded, and how many
employees they have actively. So, this
was intended for as a tool to be used by
both traders and data analysts. And it
can be used for either of those
applications.
